FuncDef: The clear inactive-configuration chassis command clears the inactive configurations of unregistered chassis.
Examples: Warning: The inactive configuration of chassis clc3 will be deleted and cannot be restored.
Info: Operating, please wait for a moment....done.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
This command is used for debugging purposes. After the chassis is removed, the offline configuration data of the chassis is cleared in order to recycle some allocated resources.
